name: A very simple and colorless adventure
name_original: A very simple and colorless adventure
description:
The Colorless Adventure

Small game made in a couple of hours for a interview.

Use keys to move

If you are new to game dev, this is a good project for you to take a look.

All mechanics have been implemented (hero, plataforms, enemy etc). It's open source so fell free to create your own levels (or any other feature)

I may release a documentation in the future to help whoever wish to create new stuff to the game. The code are pretty much commented so it may alredy help

Link to project: https://github.com/Gumemura/SweetMedia

There was to time to properly credit the author of the hero's sprite so here it is: thanks very much to https://opengameart.org/users/dezrasdragons. This is the second time i use your amazing arts.

Fell free to send me any issue/feedback/doubt

And it may work on android (but play it here on the pc, its easier)
